text: Brings a brand new transformer called NiftiMasker along with some utils in order to integrate easily data loading and masking into a scikit-learn pipeline.
title: Ni transformer

text: I think that you should only mention LeaveOneLabelOut as an example of usage, rather then the main purpose of this entry.

text:
Do we handle NaNs in the input data well? We should add a test case to check that. I guess that in this specific case, given that SPM uses NaNs to label out of brain voxels, these should be converted to zero by default.

Also, we should return a Niimg here.
title: (None, '', u'nisl/masking.py')

text:
I guess that I was wrong: we shouldn't return a Niimg. The logic should be, in general Niimg in, Niimg out. In this case, it is not Niimg in, it is array in, thus it should be array out.

I suggest as a naming convention that everything that is an nimg ends with '_img' (and I suggest renaming the input epi_img variable to mean_epi to avoid confusion).
title: (None, '', u'nisl/masking.py')

text:
I suggest renaming this function to apply_mask.

Also, the docstring doesn't match the signature. In this function, I think that I would prefer having Niimgs in.
title: (None, '', u'nisl/masking.py')

text: I suggest renaming this function to resample_img, and having a Niimg in and a Nimg out.
title: (None, '', u'nisl/resampling.py')

text: We should use the ledoit_wolf of the sickit learn. Anyhow, I don't believe that it is used in the current codebase, so we should just remove it.

text:
Merge pull request #13 from schwarty/ni_transformer

Fixed error in string formating

Rename mri_transformer to nifti_loader and move it to nisl.io

Change examples accordingly
Remove nifti_loader from plot_haxby_decoding pipeline for the sake
of clarity

Modify dataset fetching to remove session level.

Sessions are now returned as a list of session ids.
NiftiLoader to NiftiMasker
Rename haxby.data to haxby.func

Make a more extensive use of niimg where it makes sense

Resample, extract_time_series now take a niimg as parameter.
In Nifti_Masker, mask is a niimg

Warning : this has not been extensively tested so some bugs
may remain.
Experimental : replace missing nifti_masker in emergency
